title: DPS-BEST OF-for Sep 01, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Sep 01, 2020
description:
On Today's Episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP takes a look at one of baseball's best stories this season, the San Diego Padres. Patrick Ewing joins us to celebrate and tell stories about his former Head Coach, the late John Thompson. Heat TV Host Jason Jackson also joins the program to discuss the playoffs as well as reminisce with DP on their time at the Mothership. Plus, DP gives advice on how to deal with having your children leave for college.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
